subscribe.title: Subscribe
subscribe.description: Subscribe now for news about early access and beta release.
subscribe.question1: What role would you be interested in?

paras.title: User Search
paras.text: The user will go on our platform and browse for wingmen. They will be filtered to be ones found locally based on their GPS position retrieved from the web browser. Instant messaging will be available but messages won't be saved.

paras.title: Plan and Compensation
paras.text: The user will negotiate with the wingman discussing how the wingman will help and be compensated by the user. A recommended compensation strategy would be to reward the wingman with small amount when meeting, then if all goes well, reward the wingmen the rest. The plan and compensation is in no way affiliated with Wingman. It is the responsibility of the user and wingman to handle the plan and compensation. We just connect the parties, then the parties handle the rest.

paras.title: Wingman
paras.text: Users will be looking to get your help. You can write about your skills and expectations on your profile to make it easier for users to decide. It is the responsibility of you and the user to make sure your expectations are carried out when meeting with the user. This is in no way affiliated with Wingman. If you use a destination from our list of registered businesses, it is your responsibility to work out a compensation plan with the business.

paras.title: Rate and Review
paras.text: The user can rate and review the wingman. This helps other users identify the quality and skills of the wingman when searching.

paras.title: Businesses
paras.text: If you register, your business will be searchable as possible destinations in which users and wingmen can find on our platform (as suggested places to go to). Also it is your responsibility to set up a compensation deal with any wingmen you wish to work with. We just connect the parties, then the parties handle the rest.
